ygData.subject: Re: Magic gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: Depending on your level you could go kill froglocks in the sewer and get a set of netted off of them.  I dont know how long it would take to get a pair of
ygData.messageBody:
Depending on your level you could go kill froglocks in the sewer and get a
set of netted off of them. I dont know how long it would take to get a pair
of gloves off them as the loot spawn is random, but they are found on
Froglocks. I also don't know what they sell for in Queyons as I'm from the
Freeport area and I run to Guk for netted, woven and mesh armor. A glove of
any of those will work as a magic glove.

Synjyn
19th Circle
Erollisi Marr
